thread.section_title: DoYouSpain.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre DoYouSpain.com | doyouspain.com | 10 de 485
thread.title: Peter

author: Peter
title: Peter
text:
I have been using DoYouSpain for many years and without doubt it is always the cheapest and best value.
However whilst it is impossible to dictate to rental companies how they conduct their business, the most common complaint is concerning insurance and fuel.
I have my own stand alone excess annual insurance policy which covers ANY excess. Firefly rental, even though they are part of a larger respected international company, will not accept this and despite arguments, like a number of other operators they will insist on you having their insurance when it is not necessary. I have never received a reply when emailing them on this subject.
If rental companies offer a full to full option, there should be absolutely no charge levied if you return the car full as it involves no action from the company whatsoever. I accept that if they have to refuel the car there is an obvious cost and gladly pay.
